definition: conspicuously and outrageously bad or reprehensible, the entire amount of income before any deductions are made, earn before taxes, expenses, etc.
details:
adjective
- conspicuously and outrageously bad or reprehensible
= synonyms: rank
- conspicuously and tastelessly indecent
= synonyms: crude
- repellently fat
= synonyms: porcine
- lacking fine distinctions or detail
= example: lacking fine distinctions or detail
- before any deductions
= example: before any deductions
- visible to the naked eye (especially of rocks and anatomical features)
= synonyms: megascopic
- without qualification
= synonyms: stark
noun
- the entire amount of income before any deductions are made
= synonyms: receipts, revenue
- twelve dozen
verb
- earn before taxes, expenses, etc.
